location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter from James Morison, Sub-Assistant to the Commissariat at Fort St George, Madras, at Bombay to William Bruce, Resident at Bushire

mods.abstract: The letter is informing the Resident that Arratoon Constantine and Haji Mahommed Salle [Hājjī Muḥammad Salāḥ] have agreed to supply Arabian and Persian horses to the Madras Cavalry and requests a convoy for the ships that will transport them to India.
